title: Hextech Chests
body: No matter what I do I can't earn chests. I play as characters I own and get an S but never get a chest i haven't received a chest this entire seaason

replies.body:
I checked your account and see a few chests that have been earned this season. To ensure you're eligible to earn chests, be sure you're not getting S ranks on champs you've already earned a chest on. Bear in mind if you're in a premade with someone who earns an S while you're playing a champ, it counts for that champion. You can only earn 1 chest per champion per season.

For complete details on Hextech Crafting and earning chests, be sure to check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
